com.nordicid.nurapi

Class AccSensorFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nordicid.nurapi.AccSensorFilter

  • public class AccSensorFilter
extends java.lang.Object
    Nur accessory sensor filter. Configures sensor triggers/debounce parameters.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int flags
      Enabled filter flags (see AccessorySensorFilterFlag) as a bitmask.
      AccSensorFilterThreshold rangeThreshold
      Range threshold.
      AccSensorFilterThreshold timeThreshold
      Time threshold.

    • Field Detail

      • flags

        protected int flags
        Enabled filter flags (see AccessorySensorFilterFlag) as a bitmask.

      • rangeThreshold

        public AccSensorFilterThreshold rangeThreshold
        Range threshold. Goes high to low when sensors reads less than lo, low to high when sensors reads equals or more than hi. Unit: mm.

      • timeThreshold

        public AccSensorFilterThreshold timeThreshold
        Time threshold. Triggers when level going high to low for lo amount of time, and low to high for hi amount of time. Unit: ms.

        Constructor
